snippet.title: 3D Speed Runner Platformer | Hirilun
snippet.description:
Wishlist Hirilun so you do not miss the launch discount!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1407300?utm_source=m4youtube

Hirilun is a time-trial-based first-person platformer in which you will explore a dark and strange city. Run, jump, glide, sprint and dash to achieve the best possible time, and compete with your friends in worldwide leaderboards.

Hirilun is a dark and strange city, full of hidden places and high buildings. Although anyone can get in, only the fastest will achieve fame...

👉  You will need to move very quickly, running and jumping nonstop, going through all the checkpoints, and reaching your goal.
👉  You will be able to dash, sprint and plane, but use these skills wisely, as they are limited.
👉  Each level has a multitude of different paths; which will be the fastest one? You'll have to find out...
👉  Collecting the experiences that you will find along the way will make your timer stop temporarily. Still, it may not always be worth the detour...
👉  Compete with your friends and in world leaderboards that are updated every day.

#indiegame #steam #platformer
